about_the_game:
Step into a riveting sci-fi journey that unfolds in the aftermath of a catastrophic event ,terror and science fiction[/b] intertwine amidst the ruins of a broken world. Immerse yourself in dynamic fusion of space-time bending combats and earth-shattering puzzles.



Traverse the remnants of a once-thriving civilization, now reduced to a treacherous landscape shaped by the chaos of cataclysmic forces. The transformative power of Unreal Engine 5 propels you into this post-apocalyptic realm with unparalleled visual fidelity, bringing to life the intricacies of a world scarred by devastation. Marvel at the breathtakingly realistic environments as you navigate through the remnants of a world forever broken.



  • Fight back: use your powers to fight foes and defeat them using a robust chaos simulation engine of Unreal Engine 5.
  • Great bossfights: fight in evolving combats again your nemesis.
  • An evolving Nemesis: confront a powerful creature that evolves and changes every time to confront it.
  • Unreal Engine 5: Thanks to the power of Unreal Engine 5, you will find state of the art visuals and rendering in The Beggar.
  • Nvidia DLSS: Activated by default, Horror Tales The Beggar uses the most advanced Nvidia DLSS to date to achieve great performance while using Unreal Engine 5 to it's full power.
  • Steamdeck ready: Play on pc or Steamdeck thanks to tailored settings made exclusively to play at 60fps on steamdeck.
  • Intense Boss Battles: Fight in Epic Boss battles that will challenge your skills in epic environments with dynamic weather and day/night system.
  • Control the earth: Use your powers to change from day to night or flood the environment with awesome thunderstorms. Use this wisely and you will be able to progress through the story.
  • An Epic Tale: immerse yourself in a tale that will take you around many places around the world to reach your destination.

Engage in physics-based combat that adheres to the laws of the game world, immersing you in a heightened sense of realism. Strategic thinking becomes paramount as you adapt to the constantly shifting challenges, navigating a world where every action and reaction is governed by the principles of physics. It is not just a game; it is an exploration of survival instincts in an environment where the line between the fantastical and the tangible blurs seamlessly.



In this gripping journey, the synergy between the compelling narrative, innovative gameplay mechanics, and state-of-the-art technology offers an unprecedented gaming experience. Immerse yourself in a narrative where the full power of Unreal Engine 5 and Nvidia DLSS converges, pushing the boundaries of what's possible and placing the fate of this shattered world squarely in your hands.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950

short_description: Control space-time to fight an evil monster in this terror and science fiction journey set in a shattered but beautiful world. Bend physics, the sky and the earth itself in engaging boss-fight encounters with the full power of Unreal Engine 5 and Nvidia DLSS.
